page.title: 11GILLINGHAM:HOME POSSESSIONS.
page.content: This information comes from a survey by form 2D of 87 households.The figures in brackets are the percentages of the households which owned each object. {OVER 80%:}Everyone owned T.V.,Radio & Cookers.Others had Fridges{(94),} Cameras{(91),}Vacuum Cleaners{(90), } Washing Machines{(86),}Cars/Vans{(86), Telephones{(83)}& Taperecorders{(80). {50-79%}had Electric Mixers{(75),} Bicycles{(68),}Gramophones{(64),} Showers{(59)}& Drying Machines{(53). {30-49%}owned Binoculars{(48),}Gas fires & Coal/wood fires{(43),}Gas Central Heating{(40),}Videos{(39)}& Computers{(30). {PETS:}Cats were most popular{(46)}then dogs {(36) }& fish{(32). {LESS THAN 10% }owned movie cameras{ {(13)}and solar heating{(2).
